name: Re-Destine (Brackeys jam submission 2020)
description:
This project was part of Brackeys 2020 Jam 2 The theme being 'Rewind'. If you wanted to describe the main concept here in a razor statement it would be "What does King Crimson do?"

Designer: Jack McClenaghan 
Programmer: Emanuele Oliveri
Special thanks: Caffiene

  • Requium Font- Edgy but a little fancy.
  • Glitch effects - The masterful Keijiro Takahashi
  • Sounds from freesound.org:
    • tim.kahn
    • shpira
    • waveplay
    • Sergenious
    • klangfabrik
    • pulse00
    • GregorQuendel - Ambient backing.
